original: aom ku rum gi ni sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ku rum gi ni sv'ah'a /

original: 'di lan gcig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang zad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di lan gcig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang zad par 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting this once, even the karmic obscurations accumulated over a hundred thousand eons will be exhausted.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rjes su dran pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rjes su dran pa rdzogs so //
translated: The recollection of the essence of all tathagatas is complete.
